name: Spanish Confusions Corpus
description: A large-scale corpus of noise-induced robust misperceptions in Spanish
author: Máté Attila Tóth, María Luisa García Lecumberri, Yan Tang, and Martin Cooke
citation: Tóth, M. A., Lecumberri, M. L. G., Tang, Y., & Cooke, M. (2015). A corpus of noise-induced word misperceptions for Spanish. The Journal of the Acoustical Society of America, 137, EL184; doi: 10.1121/1.4905877
